summary: Four Orc followers, each with different abilities, are waiting outside of Whiterun to assist you in battle.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][b][b][i][color=#ffff00]Skyrim SE version nowÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2994]available[/url][/color][/i][/b]

[u]Description[/u][/b][/size]
Four Orc followers, each with different abilities, are waiting outside of Whiterun to assist you in battle.

[list]
[*]All are Essential.
[*]All level with the player from 3 to 100.
[*]All have custom combat styles.
[*]All are significantly (but hopefully not OP) perked in their particular skillsets.
[*]All are in the Orc crime faction and are friends of the Orc.
[*]All have morailty up to "Violence against Enemies".
[*]Reviewed with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url].
[/list]

[list]
[*]Grakzul is a old male Orc who is not yet looking for a good death. He specializes in one-handed and shield tactics and is a great tank.
[*]Khazag is a young male Orc, brash and confident. He prefers a two-hander to make short work of his enemies.
[*]Urzga is a young female Orc who finds no dishonor in stealth and a bow. But up close, she's just as dangerous, wielding dual blades with finesse.
[*]Shargol is a female Orc who took the path less travelled. She is a very capable mage - able to deal death from her fingertips.
[/list]

[size=4][b][u]Where Do I Find Them?[/u][/b][/size]
Orcs like to keep to themselves, even outside their strongholds. They can be found southwest of Whiterun, across the road, near a fallen tree where they have made camp.

[size=4][b][u]Requirements[/u][/b][/size]
Vanilla Skyrim. No DLCs required.

[size=4][b][u]Versions[/u][/b][/size]
See "Latest Version" above.
See "Changes" link above for changelog.

[size=4][b][u]Installation[/u][/b][/size]
Download with NMM. Activate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Removal[/u][/b][/size]
Dismiss any followers from the mod.
Deactivate in NMM.

[size=4][b][u]Compatibility[/u][/b][/size]
No known issues.
Uses only vanilla assets.
Recommended mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO-Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19903]Follower Trade Priority[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18794/?]Challenging AI - Aggressive Combat Styles[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2700/?]Duel - Combat Realism[/url]
Mods used in the screenshots:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30/?]No More Blocky Faces[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48490/?]Orc Eyes Alternate[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36510/?]Superior Lore-Friendly Hair - HD Textures[/url]

[size=4][b][u]Bugs[/u][/b][/size]
When you first get a follower, on rare occasion its stats may not be updated until you level up. You can use the console to prompt them to refresh their stats immediately. Go into the console, click on the follower, and type:
[b]setlevel 1000 0 3 100[/b]

[size=4][b][u]My Mods[/u]
[b][list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1#]Skyrim Special Edition[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Skyrim[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/manage/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/users/774541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Oblivion[/url]
[/list][/b]
[/b][/size]
author: LazyAltmer

files.name: Orc Followers 1_1
files.changelogHtml:
1) Improved Shargol's mage abilities significantly:
- Provide her with Novice->Expert fire & frost spells.
- Remove default shock spells
- Add Necromancy spells, including a custom higher-level Dread Zombie spell.
- Add custom auto-leveling flesh spell
- Add more perks for destruction and necromancy
- Adjust class and combat style accordingly
2) Add collision box over their campfire to keep the orcs from walking through the fire.
